---
description: Create and maintain simple plan.md and tasks.md documentation for custom plans
name: plan-tasks-quizme
argument-hint: <directory-path> <action: create|update|review>
agent: plan
---

# Plan-Tasks Documentation Manager Prompt

See [the plan agent](../agents/plan.agent.md) for full implementation details.

This prompt provides access to the Plan-Tasks Documentation Manager, which helps create, update, and maintain simple custom plans (NOT SpecKit - for SpecKit use /speckit.* agents).
